name: Tom S.
review: This is my local watering hole and I love the place. Always different beers on tap and good service. Occasionally there are also live music from local jazz musicians. Great place!!

name: Andres P.
review: A really cozy place to enjoy chatting with friends and listen soft music. The personal is also very nice and there are good beers to choose.

name: Stefanie Z.
review: Cool live jazz, great beer selection and friendly staff. Come early if you want a seat!

name: Morten M.
review: Kind service. Fair prices. 10 craft beers on tap, a few bottles/can as well. Very small place, but very cosy.

name: Morten B.
review: Best craftbeer bar in Aarhus according to me. 14 different taps with a wide selection from pilsner to sour, hoppy and dark. Also has a decent fridge with cans and bottles. Cosy modern hipster vibe. Service is super, especially the bartender Marcus has big beer knowledge and good guidance.

name: Catherine O.
review: I absolutely love this cellar bar. The selection of pilsners are excellent, so was the IPAs. A lot of the beers have quite a high AVB but what we had were under our nothing more than 6%. We visited a few times and weâ€™ll be back on our next trip.

name: Petteri D.
review: Cozy craft beer bar. Their seating is quite bad though: the wooden box type seats look stylish and inviting, yet functionally their 90 degree angles just aren't comfortable to sit on at all, especially if you're a tall dude like me. Removes a lot from the experience since you'll be sitting down most of the time.

name: Jesper R.
review: One of the best craftbeer bars in town. It pars with Ã¸lsnedkeren in many ways. Its hard to find ways to describe differences. A bit more variation on selection of craftbeer types. But here they have less space which makes it a cosier place with room for 'hygge'.

name: Ry F.
review: An exceptional beer bar. We wandered in here before dinner. A fantastic selection of creative and tasty beers. The staff was knowledgeable and we had some great discussion of the beer styles and brewing in Denmark!

name: David R.
review: Fantastic craft beer bar in the center of Aarhus. ðŸ¤© Impressive selection of quality beers and perhaps the...

name: Bob K.
review: Knowledgeable and friendly staff are able to find you beers that you want to drink from a good selection on draft of local and international beers and some real gems in the fridges.

name: Angela V.
review: Not as good as the Copenhagen bar, but still worth a stop. Good beers on tap, not much on cans or bottles.
